The five kinds of overflowing merit, ove: Medicines and supplies for the sick
The extent of overflowing merit [an5.45:: It’s not easy to grasp how much merit they have by saying that this is the extent of their overflowing merit
It’s simply reckoned as an incalculable, immeasurable, great mass of merit
The comparison of overflowing merit to w: It’s like trying to grasp how much water is in the ocean
It’s not easy to say: ‘This is how many gallons, how many hundreds, thousands, hundreds of thousands of gallons there are.’
It’s simply reckoned as an incalculable, immeasurable, great mass of water.
The streams of merit (a causal sequence): The streams of merit reach that astute person
As the rivers bring their waters to the sea.
